name: Adventures of the Noodles
description:
You follow a story of a Noodler, who lives on a planet far far away.  One night a rocket crashes with an unknown (to the inhabitants of the planet) creature known as Human. You help them to rebuild a rocket and send them back to their own planet. But there is another opposition living on this planet - Demons. They want to take Human away to study what kind of species they are. Through a lot of challenges, you need to help Human find their way back home.

A small non-commercial game created in Unreal Engine 4 as a practice. (Practice involved working with cinematics, QTEs, level streaming, ...).

Game features full English support (text + subtitles + dubbing) and full Russian support (text + subtitles + dubbing).
